content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any Iron Ore in my inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace for smelting.
# I need to gather more Iron Ore before I can proceed with the smelting process.

# I will move to the nearest Iron Ore resource and harvest some to replenish my inventory.
move_to(nearest(Resource.IronOre))  # Move to the nearest Iron Ore resource.
harvest_resource(nearest(Resource.IronOre), quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 Iron Ore.

# After harvesting, I will check my inventory to confirm that I have Iron Ore available.
print(f'Updated Inventory after harvesting Iron Ore: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the inventory after harvesting.
